extension.name: OPC Export - Supplier Email CSV Ordering System
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: Configuration for Supplier Email CSV System. This system uses your products manufacturer field to group order items per supplier.

param.name: allowconfirm
param.label: Enable confirm page
param.description: Will show confirmation page before processing of the order items. When automatic processing is enabled, dual export is not possible.

param.name: sendcc
param.label: CC Email Address
param.description: Will always add this email address as CC

param.name: changeorderstatussecondstep
param.label: Enable order status change at second step
param.description: This will allow to update the order status after the XLS was generated.

param.name: avai_to_status
param.label: Pair availability string custom field to status
